part.content: CHAPTER II : LICENSING OF DRIVERS OF MOTOR VEHICLES. Sec. 3 - 28.
CHAPTER III : LICENSING OF CONDUCTORS OF STAGE CARRIAGES. Sec. 29 - 38
CHAPTER IV : REGISTRATION OF MOTOR VEHICLES. Sec. 39 - 65.
CHAPTER V : CONTROL OF TRANSPORT VEHICLES. Sec. 66 - 96.
CHAPTER VI : SPECIAL PROVISIONS RELATING TO STATE TRANSPORT UNDERTAKING. Sec. 97 - 108.
CHAPTER VII : CONSTRUCTION, EQUIPMENT AND MAINTENANCE OF MOTOR VEHICLES. Sec. 109 - 111.
CHAPTER VIII : CONTROL OF TRAFFIC. Sec. 112 - 138.
CHAPTER IX : MOTOR VEHICLES TEMPORARILY LEAVING OR VISITING INDIA. Sec. 139.
CHAPTER X : LIABILITY WITHOUT FAULT IN CERTAIN CASES. Sec. 140 - 144.
CHAPTER XI : INSURANCE OF MOTOR VEHICLES AGAINST THIRD PARTY RISKS. Sec. 145 - 164.
CHAPTER XIII : OFFENCES, PENALTIES AND PROCEDURE. Sec. 177 - 210.
